steps.title: Brown
steps.content: Brown Earthy brown tones represent stability and groundedness, which makes them perfect for Virgos. These colors enhance Virgo’s natural strengths as an earth sign, while also providing extra grounding energy during stressful times. [1] X Research source

steps.title: Green
steps.content: Green As a mutable sign, Virgo is very adaptable, and they're always growing and evolving. They're also very even-keeled and practical when making decisions. [2] X Research source The color green symbolizes balance and growth, which aligns very well with Virgo’s energy. It enhances and complements their natural qualities, so it’s no surprise that it’s one of Virgo’s best colors. [3] X Research source

steps.title: Blue
steps.content: Blue Blue has a calming, serene energy, which can be very useful for Virgos. [4] X Research source Virgos' active minds and diligent natures can make them susceptible to stress and anxiety, so they definitely benefit from the soothing effects of blue tones. [5] X Research source

steps.title: White
steps.content: White The color white symbolizes new beginnings, which can resonate deeply with ever-evolving Virgos. A Virgo’s great strength is their ability to clear out old energies, adapt, and embrace fresh starts, and the color white complements this nicely. [6] X Research source

steps.title: Red
steps.content: Red Red symbolizes boldness, passion, and action. While these things are definitely valuable, they tend to be out of alignment with Virgo’s natural personality. [7] X Research source The intense energy of red tends to be too overwhelming for reserved, introspective Virgos. [8] X Research source

steps.title: Orange
steps.content: Orange Orange represents frenetic energy and spontaneity, which can also be too much for Virgos. [9] X Research source Organized and steady by nature, Virgos prefer to have everything minutely planned out, and they don’t like to make spur-of-the-moment decisions. [10] X Research source As a result, they tend to be out of alignment with the energy of orange.

steps.title: Hot Pink
steps.content: Hot Pink Down-to-earth Virgos usually don’t resonate with bright, showy colors like hot pink. [11] X Research source This also goes for extra bright shades of colors within their palette. You’re much more likely to spot a Virgo wearing a muted sage green or deep forest green than a neon green, for example.

steps.title: Wear clothes and accessories that are in your color palette.
steps.content: Wear clothes and accessories that are in your color palette. Look for neutral brown and tan tones when picking out clothing. As a no-nonsense, down-to-earth Virgo, you’ll feel comfortable and confident in these grounding, earthy colors. You can also go for a pop of green with your accessories to manifest abundance and personal growth! [12] X Research source

steps.title: Use makeup in your color palette.
steps.content: Use makeup in your color palette. Virgos tend to have a fresh-faced, natural beauty about them. [13] X Research source This energy goes very well with subtle, classic makeup looks. When picking eyeshadows and lip colors, consider opting for tan, brown, muted pink, and golden tones, rather than super vibrant shades.

steps.title: Decorate your home or workspace with your lucky colors.
steps.content: Decorate your home or workspace with your lucky colors. Add grounding brown and tan, crisp white, and calming blue shades to your living space or office to channel their energies. [14] X Research source You can go all out and paint walls and buy furniture in these colors, or you can simply add some decorative accents like throw pillows, blankets, and wall art.

steps.title: Birthstones
steps.content: Birthstones Virgos are born between August 23rd and September 22nd. [15] X Research source So, if you’re a Virgo, your birthstone is either peridot (August) or sapphire (September). [16] X Research source Peridot is green and sapphire is blue, which means that jewelry with these stones will go perfectly with clothes in the Virgo color palette! Here’s some more info on each: Peridot: This green crystal is a powerful good luck charm. It can help Virgos cultivate positive energies and attract the things they want to manifest. [17] X Research source Sapphire: Sapphires bring mental clarity and promote self-expression. They can help Virgos find the confidence to share their ideas and wisdom with the world. [18] X Research source

steps.title: Other lucky crystals
steps.content: Other lucky crystals There are several beautiful crystals you may feel a special connection to as a Virgo. You can wear them on jewelry, carry them in your bag or pocket, or display them in your home to harness their unique powers. [19] X Research source Here’s a list of the best crystals for Virgos, plus descriptions of their effects: Smoky Quartz : Balances the root chakra and brings stability. Can also soothe stress and calm overthinking, which is great for perfectionistic Virgos. [20] X Research source Moss Agate : Encourages workaholic Virgos to slow down, connect with nature, and appreciate the simple pleasures in life. [21] X Research source Green Aventurine : Invites prosperity and wealth into Virgo’s life, while also helping them break free from old patterns and habits that are no longer serving them. [22] X Research source Citrine : Uplifts Virgos and encourages them to let go of their perfectionistic natures to see the bright side, even when things don’t go as planned. Black Tourmaline : Protects against any negativity or bad energy, which is great for Virgos who are prone to stress or anxiety. [23] X Research source

steps.title: Fox
steps.content: Fox Like Virgos, foxes are known for being shrewd, clever, and adaptable. [24] X Research source With all of their shared traits, it’s no wonder that many Virgos feel a deep connection to this intelligent and quick-witted animal!

steps.title: Deer
steps.content: Deer Deer symbolize gentleness, grace, and purity, traits that are commonly associated with Virgos, as well. [25] X Research source These elegant animals also call to mind earthy forest imagery, which is exactly Virgo’s vibe.

steps.title: Bear
steps.content: Bear Bears symbolize strength, wisdom, and a hard-working nature. These traits are all spot-on for industrious and intelligent Virgos. Virgos also have very strong protective instincts for the ones they love, just like mama bears do for their cubs. [26] X Research source

steps.title: Beaver
steps.content: Beaver Virgos are nothing if not hardworking, determined, and efficient—just like beavers. These impressive animals quickly construct structurally-sound dams, persevering until they’ve successfully completed their task. This energy is quintessentially Virgo! [27] X Research source

steps.title: Virgo’s luckiest numbers are 3, 5, 6, & 8.
steps.content: Virgo’s luckiest numbers are 3, 5, 6, & 8. You may find that you come across these numbers often, as they’re attracted to your energy. You can actively incorporate these numbers into your life by using them as passwords, planning events on dates that include them, or visualizing them as you meditate . [28] X Research source
